variables.description: Pressure at the bottom of the atmosphere.

variables.name: O3e_ndens
variables.description: error in the weighted average of the number density (#molecules/cm3)

variables.description: error in the weighted average of the partial ozone columns (DU/layer)

variables.description: error in the weighted average of the volume mixing ratio (ppmv)

variables.description: total column error: quadratically added o3e_du (DU)

variables.description: total column: vertically integrated O3_du dataset (DU)

variables.description: weighted average of the number density (#molecules/cm3)

variables.name: O3_du
variables.description: weighted average of the partial ozone columns (DU/layer)

variables.name: O3_vmr
variables.description: weighted average of the volume mixing ratio (ppmv)
